page.title: 07Four Oaks Housing.
page.content: Today we went to the biggest garden in our area.We wallked there and we had to cross over two very busy roads, Walsall Road and Rosemary Hill Road.We took our own chip boards to write on. When we got to the right house in Park Drive we went to see the garden. It was almost ten times bigger than yours or mine. It was nearly 35 acres, but bit by bit the garden got smaller and it is now 7 acres. A man had to go around with us in case we got lost. They had a tractor type of lawn mower with blades three metress wide. The grass there was partly an unusual grass called camomile. They had a pond which used to be part of a big swimming pool. A lot of trees in the garden did not grow from a little seed, they were brought from America. There were many pink. purple and dark rhododendrons in the garden.
